content: --राष्ट्रः ‘the great kingdom,’ <ab>N.</ab> of a country in the west of India, the country of the Marāṭhās. {2} the people of Mahārāṣṭra, the Marāṭhās (<ab>pl.</ab>). (--ष्ट्री <ab>N.</ab> of the principal Prākṛta dialect, the language of the people of the Mahārāṣṭra; <ab>cf.</ab> Daṇḍin: --महाराष्ट्राश्रयां भाषां प्रकृष्टं प्रकृतं विदः <ls>Kāv. 1. 34.</ls>
